bgu.csp.az.api.agt
Class SimpleAgent

java.lang.Object
  bgu.csp.az.api.Agt0DSL
      bgu.csp.az.api.Agent
          bgu.csp.az.api.agt.SimpleAgent

public abstract class SimpleAgent
extends Agent

SimpleAgent is an agent that uses annotations instead of multiple message objects and manages a major parts of the algorithm tasks by its own.

Method Summary
protected  SimpleMessage beforeMessageProcessing(SimpleMessage msg)
          you can override this method to perform preprocessing before messages arrive to their functions you can change the message or even return completly other one - if you will return null the message is rejected and dumped.
 void handleTermination()
          this function called when a SYS_TERMINATION Message Arrived -> it just calls finish on the agent, you can override it to make your own termination handling.

public Message processNextMessage()
                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Description copied from class: Agent
request the agent to process the next message (waiting if no such message in this agent mailbox)

send

public SendbleObject send(java.lang.String msg,
                          java.lang.Object... args)
sends a new message the message should have a name and any number of arguments the message will be sent received by an agent in the method that defines @WhenReceived with the name of the message (case sensitive!) and the arguments will be inserted to the parameters of that method usage: send("MESSAGE_NAME", ARG1, ARG2, ..., ARGn).to(OTHER_AGENT_ID)

Parameters:
msg - the message name
args - the list (variadic) of arguments that belongs to this message
Returns:
continuation class

beforeMessageProcessing

protected SimpleMessage beforeMessageProcessing(SimpleMessage msg)
you can override this method to perform preprocessing before messages arrive to their functions you can change the message or even return completly other one - if you will return null the message is rejected and dumped.

Parameters:
msg -
Returns:

handleTermination

public void handleTermination()
this function called when a SYS_TERMINATION Message Arrived -> it just calls finish on the agent, you can override it to make your own termination handling.
